courseDescription: This course will give you the basic overview of what are the different components computer comprises of and how they work as a single unit.
courseOutlines: Getting familiar with CPU and its components
Understand the difference between RAM and ROM
What are different kinds of storage options available ?
Introduction to peripheral devices and I/O.

courseDescription: This course will give you the basic understanding of Operating Systems and thier importance in Computer Science
courseOutlines: Understand Process and Inter Process Communication
Deadlock and how to handle different deadlock scenarios

courseDescription: Here we will discuss about the fundamental building blocks of Internet and different technologies that facilitates the working of World Wide Web
courseOutlines: Undertand the different models of networking such as OSI and TCP/IP

courseDescription: In this course we will learn about the TCP/IP and its role in Internet
courseOutlines: Connection Oriented and Connection less protocols
Some classic use cases of TCP/IP
